home.title: MedScope
home.description: An experimental AI-powered tool for advanced medical image analysis and early disease detection support.

upload.title: Image Upload
upload.desc: Upload a diagnostic image for AI-powered analysis.

analysis.title: AI-Assisted Evaluation
analysis.desc: The system analyzes the image to identify potential anomalies.

results.title: Analysis Results
results.desc: Receive a report with initial findings and an assessment of possible diagnoses.

steps.instructions: Upload an image or capture a photo with your camera to start the analysis. Ensure the image is clear and well-lit.

footer.description: AI-powered medical image analysis for early disease detection.
footer.disclaimer: This tool is for research and educational purposes only. It does not replace professional medical consultation.

upload.title: AI Analysis with MedScope
upload.instructions: Upload a medical image or take a photo with your camera. The AI will analyze it to detect potential anomalies.

upload_dropzone.instructions: Upload a medical image or take a photo with your camera.

errors.permission_denied: Camera permission denied. Please enable it in your browser settings.
errors.no_camera: No camera found. Please connect a camera and try again.

dataset.title: Database and AI Model
dataset.description: MedScope uses high-quality medical databases for disease detection research.

model.title: AI Model
model.description: The model has been optimized with advanced deep learning techniques, including transfer learning and image preprocessing.

github.title: GitHub Repository
github.description: Explore the complete source code, AI model details, API integration, and documentation. Contributions and feedback are welcome.
github.model_desc: Technical details and architecture of the AI model used for medical image analysis.
github.api_desc: Available endpoints for integrating AI-assisted diagnostics into other systems.
github.documentation_desc: Complete project documentation, including usage guides and technical specifications.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions or would like to collaborate, feel free to reach out via WhatsApp, email, GitHub, or LinkedIn.

form.title: Send a Message
form.error: Please fill in both fields before sending.

uploaddicom.title: Upload MRI Scan
uploaddicom.description: Upload an MRI scan in NIfTI (.nii, .nii.gz) or DICOM (.dcm) format. The AI will analyze it.
uploaddicom.drag_drop: Drag and drop an MRI file (.nii, .nii.gz, .dcm) or click to select.
uploaddicom.invalid_file: Invalid file type. Only NIfTI (.nii, .nii.gz) or DICOM (.dcm) files are allowed.
uploaddicom.invalid_nifti: Invalid NIfTI file. Please check the format.

about.title: About MedScope
about.description_1: MedScope is an experimental platform powered by artificial intelligence, designed to analyze medical images and assist in medical consultations with advanced technology.
about.description_2: Using deep learning, it identifies clinical patterns in imaging studies and provides insights based on medical databases, supporting decision-making in healthcare settings.
about.disclaimer: MedScope is a support and reference tool. It does not replace professional medical evaluation or provide definitive diagnoses. Consult a specialist for an accurate assessment.

research.title: Ongoing Research
research.desc: The AI model is under continuous development, improving its accuracy and analysis capabilities in medical environments.

analysis.title: AI-Assisted Evaluation
analysis.desc: MedScope uses deep learning to detect patterns in medical images. Its use is for reference only and does not replace a clinical diagnosis.

consultation.title: Professional Supervision Required
consultation.desc: For an accurate evaluation, consult a healthcare professional. MedScope is only a support tool in medical research.

ai_tools.title: AI Diagnostic Tools
ai_tools.description: Select a tool to analyze medical images with artificial intelligence and detect potential anomalies.

melanoma.title: Melanoma Detection
melanoma.description: AI-powered analysis of skin images for early detection of skin cancer.

covid.title: Pneumonia and COVID-19 Diagnosis
covid.description: Evaluation of chest X-rays to identify pneumonia and COVID-19.

breast_cancer.title: Breast Cancer Biopsy Analysis
breast_cancer.description: Early detection of breast cancer through AI-powered biopsy analysis.

errors.invalid_file: Invalid file. Only images are allowed.

result.no_prediction: No prediction data available. Please upload an image and analyze it first.

diagnosis.benign_message: This lesion appears benign, which is usually not a cause for concern. However, regular skin check-ups are recommended for overall health.
diagnosis.malignant_message: This lesion may require further evaluation by a professional. While AI provides an assessment, a dermatologist's review is crucial for an accurate diagnosis.

warning.message: AI-based assessments are for informational purposes only. If you have concerns about your skin health, please consult a qualified medical professional.

disclaimer.title: MedScope Usage Notice
disclaimer.message1: MedScope is an experimental platform designed for AI-assisted medical image analysis.
disclaimer.important_note: It does not replace the evaluation of a healthcare professional.
disclaimer.message2: The information provided by AI should be taken as a reference only. Diagnosis and treatment must be conducted by certified medical professionals.
disclaimer.message3: By continuing, you acknowledge that MedScope is a project in development and that any medical decisions should be based on professional evaluation.
